name: Moon Fortune
description:
Play with the Moon Children in this exploration of play and divination. There are no rules to this game - simply play as you see fit! Collect stardust, fling rocks off mushrooms, and play a game of catch with the Moon Children! Once you've dropped your third rock off the bottom of the screen, your fortune will be revealed.

Every action you take dictates your fortune. You'll (probably) never see the same fortune twice.
